name: Mushihimesama
synopsis: Mushihimesama is a vertically-scrolling 2D shooter featuring three levels of difficulty and an arranged mode with an auto-attack feature when the player gets hit. Released in standard or limited edition (with a collectible figurine.) The game is part of a shooter subgenre known as "bullet hell" in which the screen is so full of enemy projectiles that it's hard to see anything else.
